creator: BitKeep Inc
descriptionHtml:
BitKeep is the largest multi-chain wallet, which can manage thousands of digital currencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, etc., is completely decentralized, no registration is required, one-click use, a set of mnemonic manages all assets, and the data is completely own management.

1. Super Decentralized
No registration, one-click use. BitKeep as a window for you to know the blockchain. A set of mnemonics manages all digital currencies. The data comes from the blockchain. Just backup the mnemonics and your assets will never be lost.

2. Most Chain Support
The world's largest digital currency wallet supporting the main chain, already supporting BTC, ETH, EOS, TRX, NEO, ONT, KLAY, NULS, DOGE, YTA and other dozens of main chains and their thousands of tokens, the number is still increasing.

3. Easy to Use
Experience optimization on more than 40 processes makes the wallet fast and easy. As a leader in digital asset management, BitKeep is committed to lowering the industry threshold and allowing everyone to easily own their own digital currency.

4. Security Guarantee
Investing tens of millions of dollars, original DESM encryption algorithm, industrial-grade encryption security, can double-check to ensure the security of your digital assets, even if a hacker invades your mobile phone, you cannot steal your assets.

Contact us
Website: https://bitkeep.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitKeepOS
Email: support@bitkeep.com

title: BitKeep Wallet Pro

creator: BitKeep Inc
descriptionHtml:
BitKeep is the most comprehensive decentralized multi-chain wallet in Asia, combines wallet, cross-chain, DeFi, Dapp, NFT together as one. BitKeep has more than 4,000,000 users worldwide in 168 countries and regions such as North America, Europe, Japan, South Korea, China, Russia and Southeast Asia, South Asia etc.

BitKeep Highlights:
● Multi-chain wallet: BitKeep currently supports 30+ main chains such as BTC/ETH/BSC/Polygon/Solana/DOGE and 4,5000+ asset, and the number is still increasing. Using only one set of mnemonics to manage all the tokens.

● Cross-Chain: Self-developed BitSwap transaction aggregator, support automatic optimization, cross-chain exchange, simple operation process.

● DeFi Desk: Integrate market quotations, project information and transaction, data ranks from six core dimensions, manage personal digital assets efficiently, synchronize data on blockchain in real time, buy/sell global premium assets with one click.

● DApp Ecology: Aggregation engine + DApps ecology, allowing you to interact with Web3 decentralized applications (DApps) powered by Ethereum.

● NFT Area: In the latest version, BitKeep officially supports ERC721 and launches the NFT area. It also supports display & favorite of NFT, and supports the NFT receives & transfers on ETH, BSC, HECO, Polygon, WAX etc.

Other Features:
● Users can create new wallets on Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Smart Chain (BNB), Polygon (Matic), Solana (SOL), OkChain (OKT), HECO (HT), etc.
● Send and receive thousands of assets such as BTC/ETH/BNB/UNI/SOL/USDT at any time, get notifications, and access complete transaction records
●Aggregate swap protocols to realize quick swap on DEX such as Uniswap, Sushiswap, PancakeSwap, Quickswap, DogeSwap, etc.
● Aggregate cross-chain bridges such as Polygon Network and zkSync to quickly realize the assets swap from chain to chain.
● Automatically add popular ERC20 tokens and ERC721 collectibles to your wallet

BitKeep aiming to become the world’s largest decentralized service provider.
Bring blockchain lifestyle at your fingertips

Welcome to find us at
Website: https://bitkeep.org/
Telegram: https://t.me/BitKeep_Official
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitKeepOS

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Insufficient transfer fees, guide users to BitSwap for currency exchange
2. Added new wallet sidebar: Follow us on Twitter
3. Post the article prompts the NEW HOT label, this label can be edited and customized in the background
4. NFT optimization
5. Support LUNA public chain

title: BitKeep Wallet Pro

creator: BitKeep Global Inc
descriptionHtml:
Founded in Singapore in May, 2018, BitKeep Global Inc provides secure and reliable crypto asset management services for six millions of users across more than 168 countries and regions. BitKeep has forged strategic partnership with multiple top 30 mainnets (including Polygon, Solana, BSC, ETH, Wax, Arweave, AVAX, Arbitrum, Fantom, Terra(Luna)), becoming their authorized wallet. With 40+ Mainnets, 8,000+ DApps and 45,000+ cryptocurrencies supported, BitKeep is committed to creating the world's largest gateway to the decentralized world.

BitKeep, as the top decentralized multi-chain crypto wallet in Asia, combines Wallet, Swap, NFT Market, DeFi, and DApp in a single location:

● The multi-chain Wallet supports 40+ mainstream public chains including BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, MATIC, TRX. Allowing users to manage all crypto assets with one set of mnemonics, BitKeep deploys the original DESM data encryption algorithm and a smart risk control system to safeguard mnemonics, private keys, and transaction security. Plus, features including Mainnet-specific tools provide users with an enriched crypto wallet experience
● Swap aggregates multiple decentralized trading protocols, supports real-time one-tap cross-chain trading. Other than that, it provides real-time DEX K-lines as well as LaunchPad (for IWOs). It enables users to make cross-chain swaps among BTC, ETH, BSC, HECO, Polygon, Avax, Fantom, OEC, TRX, and Solana.
● NFT Market supports display and collection of ERC721 and ERC1155 NFTs; enables receiving, sending and batch transfer. In addition, the latest version of BitKeep allows users to list NFTs for sales and purchases through the NFT Market.
● DApp connects users to a DApp ecosystem that allows them to interact with Ethereum-powered Web3 Decentralized Applications (DApps).

Other highlights:
● Allows the minting of new tokens on BTC, ETH, BSC, Polygon, Solana, OEC, HECO and other main chains within seconds;
● Allows the sending and receiving of thousands of assets on BTC/ETH/BNB/UNI/SOL/USDT with in-app notice and complete transaction records supported;
● The smart risk control system enables users to automize detection of token risks with one tap, providing real-time protection to safeguard your asset security;
● Swap 2.0 makes it easier and faster to cross chains. Quick exchange on DEX such as Uniswap, Sushiswap, PancakeSwap, etc. are supported, making all tokens on Ethereum, BSC, HECO, Polygon, Avax, Fantom, OEC, TRX, and Solana just one tap away;
● The most complete DEX market intelligence, including K-lines, asset pools, up-to-date on-chain transaction records, up-to-date on-chain data, to support users to make informed transaction decisions;
● Adds hot ERC20 tokens and ERC721 collectibles to one’s wallet automatically;
● Allows users to buy NFTs with any token.

BitKeep is committed to creating the world's largest decentralized traffic gateway.
Find the Hottest Assets with BitKeep

For any questions or problems, please contact us:
Website: https://bitkeep.com Telegram: https://t.me/BitKeep_Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitKeepOS
descriptionShort: Crypto digital wallet supporting Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, Swap and NFTMarket

2. NFT market allows you to buy NFT with any token
3. Swap enables cross-chain transactions among 223,500+ tokens
4. Discover makes you grab a reward with ease

title: BitKeep: Crypto DeFi Wallet

creator: BitKeep Global Inc
descriptionHtml:
BitKeep, the top decentralized multichain crypto wallet, provides an all-in-one solution consisting of Wallet, Swap, NFT Market, and Launchpad. With 76+ Mainnets and 45,000+ cryptocurrencies supported, BitKeep is committed to creating the world's largest gateway to the decentralized world.
You can discover the finest assets in BitKeep Wallet.
Security:
- Manage all crypto assets with one set of mnemonics. BitKeep enables APP password, facial or fingerprint verification; supports dual protection for payment; provides security detection for smart contracts, tokens, and NFTs to safeguard users' assets; Monitors malicious addresses and airdrops in real-time.
- BitKeep Secure Asset Fund safeguard your assets. BitKeep reserves $1,000,000 as the seed fund, and plans to allocate 10% of our monthly Swap revenue to the fund to ensure the continued growth of the available cash pool.

Swap:
- Swap aggregates multiple decentralized trading protocols, supports real-time one-tap cross-chain trading. BitKeep provides real-time DEX market intelligence as well as LaunchPad (for IWOs). It enables users to make cross-chain swaps among Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), BSC, HECO (HT), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), Fantom (FTM), OEC (OKT), Tron (TRX), and Solana (SOL).

Other Features:
- Allows the minting of new tokens on BTC, ETH, BSC, Polygon, Solana, OEC, HECO and other main chains within seconds
- Allows the sending and receiving of thousands kinds of assets on BTC/ETH/BNB/UNI/SOL/USDT with in-app notice and complete transaction records supported
- Swap 2.0 makes it easier and faster to move assets across different networks. BitKeep Swap supports quick exchange on DEX such as Uniswap (UNI), Sushiswap (SUSHI), PancakeSwap (CAKE), etc., making all tokens on Ethereum (ETH), BSC, HECO (HT), Polygon (MATIC), Avalanche (AVAX), Fantom (FTM), OEC (OKT), Tron (TRX), Doge, and Solana (SOL) just one tap away.
- The InstantGas features saves the trouble of getting mainnet tokens before trading, providing users with a smoother trading experience.

BitKeep Global Inc. now serves more than 7 million users worldwide, covering 168 countries in North America, Europe, and Asia. BitKeep is also the biggest decentralized wallet in Asia.

title: BitKeep: Defi Crypto Wallet

creator: BitKeep Global Inc
descriptionHtml:
BitKeep has officially upgraded to Bitget Wallet!
Faster Trading, Better Assets
Bitget Wallet - Your Web3 Trading Wallet Of The Future.

As a leading all-in-one crypto trading wallet, Bitget Wallet integrates five key features within the platform, including wallet function, Swap trading, NFT Marketplace, DApp browser, and Launchpad. Supporting over 90 blockchains such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, Polygon, Avalanche, and aggregating top DEXs and NFT marketplaces, Bitget Wallet ensures that users are provided with the best trading prices available across the market.

First established in May 2018, Bitget Global Inc. provides over 10 million users worldwide with reliable asset management services, expedient trading and swapping, and DeFi investment features. The platform covers 168 countries across North America, Europe, and Asia, placing Bitget Wallet as the largest decentralized wallet solution in Asia. In March 2023, Bitget Wallet received a $30 million capital raise from Bitget Exchange, a leading cryptocurrency trading platform, placing its total valuation at $300 million.

Key Features of Bitget Wallet：
- Multiple Security Measures: Users can bolster their security settings by enabling biometric facial / fingerprint recognition. Bitget Wallet is compatible with hardware wallets and offers authorization, smart contract, and DApp verification to enhance accessibility and transaction security. The platform also features alerts for dangerous addresses and tokens, employing multiple security measures to safeguard user assets.
- Bitget Swap: Boasting the most powerful Swap functionality in the entire network, Bitget Swap offers real-time and precise candlestick chart data, supports 90+ popular blockchains, and aggregates 100+ DEXs and 16 cross-chain bridges. It automatically sources for the best trading prices across the entire network, facilitating seamless and efficient cross-chain transactions.
- Limit Order: Users can place limit orders by specifying their desired prices and transaction duration on multiple leading blockchains such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, and Arbitrum, allowing for more convenient execution of their trading strategies.
- Gasless Swaps: Enables on-chain token swap without the need to pay for it in the native network token, removing the step of first depositing mainnet tokens and providing users with a smoother trading experience.
- Staking Service: Easily earn rewards by staking ETH and contribute to decentralizing the Ethereum network.
- NFT Marketplace: Aggregates leading NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea, Element, and LooksRare, and supports the trades of 220,000+ NFT assets using any cryptocurrency.
- DApp Browser: Supports over 20,000 DApps from multiple blockchain ecosystems, enabling secure DApp interactions and seamless switching of mainnets within DApps.
- Web3 Social Identity: Users can set ENS domain names as wallet names, making Web3 on-chain social interactions more convenient and immersive.

Faster Trading, Better Assets. Bitget Wallet, Your Web3 Trading Wallet of the Future.
descriptionShort: Bitget Wallet Your Web3 Trading Wallet Of The Future.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. BitKeep officially rebrands as Bitget Wallet
2. Add Staking feature for ETH holders to earn passive income effortlessly
3. New UI interface and visual effects
Faster Trading, Better Assets Your Web3 Trading Wallet of the Future！

- Staking Service: Easily earn rewards by staking ETH and contribute to decentralizing the Ethereum network.
- NFT Marketplace: Aggregates leading NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea, Element, and LooksRare, and supports the trades of 220,000+ NFT assets using any cryptocurrency.

Aggregates leading NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea, Element, and LooksRare, and supports the trades of 220,000+ NFT assets using any cryptocurrency.

DApp Browser
Supports over 20,000 DApps from multiple blockchain ecosystems, enabling secure DApp interactions and seamless switching of mainnets within DApps.

Web3 Social Identity
Users can set ENS domain names as wallet names, making Web3 on-chain social interactions more convenient and immersive.

First established in May 2018, BitKeep Global Inc. provides over 10 million users worldwide with reliable asset management services, expedient trading and swapping, and DeFi investment features. The platform covers 168 countries across North America, Europe, and Asia, placing Bitget Wallet as the largest decentralized wallet solution in Asia.
